fields.description: Scrapes all subjects, courses, and sections, as well as enrollment data. (This is a fixture, so it cannot be modified)
fields.name: Full deep scrape

fields.description: Scrapes all subjects, courses, and sections, but does not collect enrollment data. This scrape is much faster than the deep scrape. (This is a fixture, so it cannot be modified)
fields.name: Full shallow scrape

fields.description: Scrapes as little as possible in order to collect all subjects. (This is a fixture, so it cannot be modified)
fields.name: Subject scrape

fields.description: Scrapes ANAT 101, a course with simple sections and a single term. (This is a fixture, so it cannot be modified)
fields.name: ANAT 101: Simple sections
